Architectures

Collaboration diagram for Architectures:

Detailed Description

Target devices.

Only the AVR and ARM7TDMI platforms can be considered stable. The H8/300 support has come to halt long time ago and support for the M68K did not even start. The Emulator running on UNIX has not been extensively tested for some time.
